Thanks to this thread http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=32427 I have two columns with cells set to 'wrapText' so line breaks within the cells work as desired.
 
But column width autoSize does not work on columns with 'wrapText + line breaks' cells. I wish the column width would be the length of longest line in the column, as it works for columns without any 'wrapText + line breaks'. I suspect wrapText negates column width autoSize? As a workaround, I hardcode column width for these two columns, but perhaps there is a better method?
WorkItem.Summary: AutoSize only measures length of first line in cell with multiple lines (ALT+Enter)
